ns2:test-suite.name: Footer page links redirection in new tab
ns2:test-suite.title: Footer page links redirection in new tab

test-case.name: verify user able to open privacy policy footer link in new browser tab
test-case.title: verify user able to open privacy policy footer link in new browser tab

label.name: feature
label.value: Footer page links redirection in new tab

step.name: user clicks on Privacy Policy link in Footer
step.title: user clicks on Privacy Policy link in Footer

step.name: user validate Privacy Policy page with page title "PRIVACY POLICY"
step.title: user validate Privacy Policy page with page title "PRIVACY POLICY"

step.name: Privacy Policy link is successfully redirecting to Privacy Policy Page by validating page url
step.title: Privacy Policy link is successfully redirecting to Privacy Policy Page by validating page url

failure.message: unknown error: Cannot read property 'scrollTo' of null
failure.stack-trace: Error: An unknown server-side error occurred while processing the command. at execute(<Function>) - index.js:316:3

test-case.name: verify user able to open Feedback footer link and verify it
test-case.title: verify user able to open Feedback footer link and verify it

label.name: feature
label.value: Footer page links redirection in new tab

step.name: user navigates to feedback from footer link
step.title: user navigates to feedback from footer link

step.name: user selects radio button for first question and second question for footer
step.title: user selects radio button for first question and second question for footer

step.name: user submit the feedback form for footer
step.title: user submit the feedback form for footer

step.name: feedback is successfull with message for footer first "Thank you for providing your feedback"
step.title: feedback is successfull with message for footer first "Thank you for providing your feedback"

failure.message: unknown error: Cannot read property 'scrollTo' of null
failure.stack-trace: Error: An unknown server-side error occurred while processing the command. at execute(<Function>) - index.js:316:3

test-case.name: User can submit the feedback using all the fields
test-case.title: User can submit the feedback using all the fields

label.name: feature
label.value: Footer page links redirection in new tab

step.name: again user navigates to feedback from footer link
step.title: again user navigates to feedback from footer link

step.name: again user selects radio button for first question and second question and the comment box for footer
step.title: again user selects radio button for first question and second question and the comment box for footer

step.name: user submit the feedback form again for footer
step.title: user submit the feedback form again for footer

step.name: feedback is successfull with a message for footer second "Thank you for providing your feedback"
step.title: feedback is successfull with a message for footer second "Thank you for providing your feedback"

failure.stack-trace: Error: Request timed out after the element was still found on the page. at element(".amw-bill-payment-close-icon") - index.js:316:3
